item.title:
RT by @Dorianlynskey: One of my favorite things is recording interviews with other people, but it was an absolute treat to try it the other way round, and be interviewed about my book #TheDeathofConsensus
Huge thanks to @Dorianlynskey & @bunker_pod for making it so much fun. Have a listen:
item.dc:creator: @phil_tinline
item.description:

item.title: R to @bobbyom3282: There is a strong tendency among the centre and self-hating left (I've felt it myself) to blame every setback on progressives even when that is clearly not why it happened.
item.dc:creator: @Dorianlynskey
item.description: There is a strong tendency among the centre and self-hating left (I've felt it myself) to blame every setback on progressives even when that is clearly not why it happened.

item.title: Many opportunistic pieces blaming the "wrong" kind of feminist (too shrill, too complacent, too inclusive, whatever the writer dislikes) for the Dobbs ruling without mentioning the simple fact that conservative justices were going to do this as soon as they had a SC majority.
item.dc:creator: @Dorianlynskey
item.description: Many opportunistic pieces blaming the "wrong" kind of feminist (too shrill, too complacent, too inclusive, whatever the writer dislikes) for the Dobbs ruling without mentioning the simple fact that conservative justices were going to do this as soon as they had a SC majority.

item.title: St Vincent is out there with a dream band delivering the best show since David Byrne's American Utopia. She's a miracle.

item.title: One thing I've learned in recent years is that whenever I've had doubts about a public figure, those doubts have been confirmed to put it mildly. If you feel that someone might be a bigot or a crank, trust your gut. There is only a slim chance you will be proved pleasantly wrong.
item.dc:creator: @Dorianlynskey
item.description: One thing I've learned in recent years is that whenever I've had doubts about a public figure, those doubts have been confirmed to put it mildly. If you feel that someone might be a bigot or a crank, trust your gut. There is only a slim chance you will be proved pleasantly wrong.
